name: root

scripts.scalingo-postbuild: echo "$APP_DIR" ; CI=true ; yarn test:type && yarn "build:$APP_DIR" && yarn workspaces focus "$APP_DIR" --production
scripts.build:api: yarn workspaces focus api && yarn workspace api run build && yarn workspaces focus --all && yarn test
scripts.build:server: yarn workspaces focus server && yarn workspace server run build
scripts.lint:quiet: yarn lint:eslintrc && yarn lint:eslint --quiet && yarn lint:prettier
scripts.lint: yarn lint:eslintrc && yarn lint:eslint && yarn lint:prettier
scripts.postinstall: yarn workspaces foreach -piv --exclude site run prepack
scripts.test: CI=true yarn workspaces foreach run test
scripts.clean: yarn workspaces foreach run clean && rimraf node_modules
scripts.start: yarn workspaces foreach -piv --exclude site run start & yarn workspace site run start
scripts.moso:up: yarn workspace modele-social up && yarn workspace exoneration-covid up && yarn workspace site upgrade modele-social
